import { useSubscription, useMqttState } from 'mqtt-react-hooks'; import './App.css'; function App() { const { connectionStatus } = useMqttState(); const temperature = useSubscription('dht11/sensor/temperature/state'); const humidity = useSubscription('dht11/sensor/humidity/state'); return (
{/*
*/} {temperature?.message?.message || 0}°
{temperature?.message?.message || 0}° {humidity?.message?.message || 0}%
° {connectionStatus}
{/**/} {/* */}
 
{/**/} {/* */}
humidity
{humidity?.message?.message || 0}% {/**/}
); } export default App;
